author: CBC News
title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world on Sunday
description: A Holland American cruise ship hit with a COVID-19 outbreak will be allowed through the Panama Canal, as it heads for its final destination in Florida.
content:
The latest:
  • Panama reverses decision to bar Holland America ship from transiting waterway. 
  • Canada now has 5,655 confirmed and presumptive coronavirus cases and 61 deaths. 
  • Trudeau announces new rules for domestic travel.
